title: Jax's Rage
timeline: 3 days after exposure, same time as Chapter 28
location: Jax and Elara's shared quarters, Free Level

knows: Everything they had might have been performance
He wants to believe she loved him but can't trust it
Finn is trying to help him
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Rage, heartbreak, self-destructive, using Drift again after 8 months clean, questioning what was real
Jax Varro.physical_state: Bloody knuckles from punching walls, Drift-intoxicated

knows: Jax wants to believe Elara loved him
Finn needs to help him heal
Finn.emotional_state: Worried, protective, loving but refusing to take advantage

revealed_to_reader: Jax destroyed everything that reminded him of Elara
Jax relapsed on Drift after 8 months clean
Jax bloody knuckles from hitting walls
Deep down Jax wants to believe she loved him
Finn refuses to take advantage of Jax's pain
Jax doesn't know what was real about their relationship
Jax is drowning in grief and Drift

planted.significance: Part of his spiral before eventual recovery

active_tensions: Finn's unrequited love versus refusal to take advantage
Jax's desire to believe Elara versus betrayal
Free Level needing leadership while Jax falls apart
world_changes: Jax is not functioning as leader
